Actions.Name: Delete the IPN's express_checkout completed webhook
Actions.Description: Deletes the Entegrations.io webhook that corresponds to the PayPal IPN's express_checkout completed webhook.

Actions.Name: Delete the IPN's new_case created webhook
Actions.Description: Deletes the Entegrations.io webhook that corresponds to the PayPal IPN's new_case created webhook.

Actions.Name: Delete the IPN's recurring_payment completed webhook
Actions.Description: Deletes the Entegrations.io webhook that corresponds to the PayPal IPN's recurring_payment completed webhook.

Actions.Name: Create a PayPal Invoice
Actions.Description: Create a draft PayPal Invoice and immediately sends it to a receiver as per their APIs https://developer.paypal.com/docs/api/invoicing/v1/#invoices_create and https://developer.paypal.com/docs/api/invoicing/v1/#invoices_send

Actions.Name: Create a QBO Invoice
Actions.Description: Create and sends and a QuickBooks Online Invoice as per their API https://developer.intuit.com/app/developer/qbo/docs/api/accounting/ecommerce/invoice

Actions.Name: Create PayPal Payouts
Actions.Description: Create PayPal Payouts to one or more receivers as per their API https://developer.paypal.com/docs/api/payments.payouts-batch/v1/#payouts_create

Actions.Name: Advanced Use: When invoicing, payouts updates received
Actions.Description: Advanced Use: Creates an entegrations.io webhook for PayPal Invoicing, Payouts etc webhooks data and it triggers whenever entegrations.io receives an on-behalf-of webhook payload from PayPal. Note that this is default payload, getting you whatever PayPal sends out.

Actions.Name: Advanced Use: Delete the invoicing, payouts etc webhook
Actions.Description: Advanced Use: Deletes the Entegrations.io webhook that corresponds to the PayPal webhook.

Actions.Name: Delete the invoice paid webhook
Actions.Description: Deletes the Entegrations.io webhook that corresponds to the PayPal Invoice paid webhook.

Actions.Name: Whenever an invoice (at PayPal) is paid
Actions.Description: Creates an entegrations.io webhook for PayPal Invoicing Paid data and it triggers whenever entegrations.io receives an on-behalf-of webhook payload for Invoice Paid from PayPal.

Actions.Name: Advanced Use: When an IPN (generic) update is received
Actions.Description: Advanced Use: Creates an entegrations.io webhook for PayPal IPN event data and it triggers whenever entegrations.io receives an on-behalf-of IPN payload from PayPal. Note that this is default payload, getting you whatever PayPal sends out.

Actions.Name: Delete the generic IPN webhook
Actions.Description: Deletes the Entegrations.io webhook that corresponds to the PayPal IPN's generic webhook.

Actions.Name: Whenever Express Checkout payment is completed
Actions.Description: Creates an entegrations.io webhook for PayPal express_checkout completed IPN event and it triggers whenever entegrations.io receives an on-behalf-of ipn payload from PayPal.

Actions.Name: Whenever New Case is created
Actions.Description: Creates an entegrations.io webhook for PayPal new case created IPN event and it triggers whenever entegrations.io receives an on-behalf-of ipn payload from PayPal.

Actions.Name: Whenever Recurring Payment is completed
Actions.Description: Creates an entegrations.io webhook for PayPal recurring payment completed IPN event and it triggers whenever entegrations.io receives an on-behalf-of ipn payload from PayPal.

Actions.Name: Delete the payouts success webhook
Actions.Description: Deletes the Entegrations.io webhook that corresponds to the PayPal Payouts success webhook.

Actions.Name: Whenever payouts is paid
Actions.Description: Creates an entegrations.io webhook for PayPal Payouts Paid data and it triggers whenever entegrations.io receives an on-behalf-of webhook payload for Payouts Paid from PayPal.

Actions.Name: Whenever a Contact is created or updated at Xero
Actions.Description: Creates an entegrations.io webhook for Xero Contacts data and it triggers whenever entegrations.io receives an on-behalf-of webhook payload for Contacts from Xero.

Actions.Name: Delete the Contacts webhook
Actions.Description: Deletes the Entegrations.io webhook that corresponds to the Xero Contacts updates webhook.

Actions.Name: Whenever an Invoice is created or updated at Xero
Actions.Description: Creates an entegrations.io webhook for Xero Invoices updates data and it triggers whenever entegrations.io receives an on-behalf-of webhook payload for Invoices from Xero.

Actions.Name: Delete the Invoices webhook
Actions.Description: Deletes the Entegrations.io webhook that corresponds to the Xero Invoices webhook.
